original_title: Walt Disney's Timeless Tales: Volume Two
overview: Timeless Tales Volume Two has some of the most endearing stories the world has ever known. This volume contains two Academy Award(R)-winning shorts "Ugly Duckling" and "The Country Cousin" (Best Short Subject, Cartoons, 1939 and 1936), "The Wind In The Willows," and "Ferdinand the Bull"
title: Walt Disney's Timeless Tales: Volume Two
